column4: Is there any way to install WinXP Pro on another drive on an existing Dapper installation
see my above comments about Windows. PATA, and master device.
no mater what order you install your OSes, Linux cannot write to NTFS reliably.
Would the easiest think for me to do is to install xp pro/ntfs on my spare drive first and then reinstall Dapper on my second drive and rebuilt it?
